KUNAMI_TIMEOUT.description: When pressing a button from a 5 button remote, this is the max ms between events for them to be considered part of the same action

CONCURRENT_CHANGES.description: When working through lists of unknown size, limit to x entities at a time to reduce load

MAX_BRIGHTNESS.description: Highest brightness number to use for light brightness

MIN_BRIGHTNESS.description: Enforce a number higher than 1 for min brightness. Only applies to lights that identify as 'on'

MONGO_URI.description: Mongo URI string. Include database in url

MONGO_CERT.description: Optional configuration item, used with mongo ssl connections

MONGO_KEY.description: Optional configuration item, used with mongo ssl connections

MONGO_CA.description: Optional configuration item, used with mongo ssl connections

MONGO_CRL.description: Optional configuration item, used with mongo ssl connections

CACHE_TTL.description: How long to store short term cache information for

FORCE_EVENING_HOUR.description: After this hour, the solar calculator will forcibly consider it 'evening'. Useful for logic that can be thrown off by longer days
